description.english: This is the real water that birds don't drink!
A little love bite... it hurts a lot!
A small dose of courage to start the day off right!
You Finished the Game only with the Machete
You managed to end the Zombie apocalypse, clean up your swamp and save your friends!
You have started your journey, be brave!
You're back in the game, and that deserves to be celebrated!
You started the game again, you love challenges!
